abstract: Milo Beckman should know how to count better than this. I mean, the boy's in COLLEGE, for God's sake!
snippet: Milo Beckman should know how to count better than this. I mean, the boy's in COLLEGE, for God's sake!
lead_paragraph: WEDNESDAY'S PUZZLE - Sorry about the title. The Girl is learning to drive, and braking seems to be very much on our minds these days. That, and parallel parking, as well as not taking turns on two wheels. I will get through this, but I'm pretty sure that this is the point in raising children where parents skip over other comforts and just turn directly to heroin.
